creator: shopalias1@techno.ms
text:
Could you perhaps also provide the sources for apache-log4j-extras in the maven repository? There is a apache-log4j-extras-1.2.17-source-release.zip which does contain them and can actually serve as source jar for Eclipse when renamed to apache-log4j-extras-1.2.17-sources.jar , but a simple "Download Sources" from doesn't work.

Thank you very much!
